title: Can anyone help me identify this font?
content:
Hi,

Can some one please help me identify this font?  
I came across this font while reading a magazine.  
I would really like to know what font it is.\  
I've attached a photo of the font.

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [dot font.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200740/http:/typophile.com/files/dot%20font.JPG) | 102.26 KB |
author: julia kim

comments.content: Next time try posting on the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414200740/http:/typophile.com/typeid) that's meant for such questions.
